definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.english: It's much cheaper to anticipate rather than respond.
sentences.chinese: 因为预先做出反应远比事后补救便宜的多。

sentences.english: Matter turning worse advise what remedy .
sentences.chinese: 情况不妙，请电告补救方案。

sentences.english: Find your reason and try to remedy it by changing your ways.
sentences.chinese: 找到你的原因并通过改变你的生活方式来进行补救。

sentences.english: Taking preventive action beforehand and remedial action afterwards are the two common methods of warding off taboos.
sentences.chinese: 事前设防和事后补救是禳解禁忌的两种常用的方法。

sentences.english: There are holistic and traditional remedies that focus on ADHD.
sentences.chinese: 有整体的传统的补救方法来针对多动症。

sentences.english: There is no remedy for love but to love more. - Thoreau.
sentences.chinese: 爱没有补救的方法，只有更多地去爱。

sentences.english: Default party will indemnify the non-breaching party for remedy of, but not limited to, the economic loss.
sentences.chinese: 违约方赔偿未违约方补救，但不限于经济损失。

sentences.english: There is no effective enforcement mechanism and remedies for workers at all.
sentences.chinese: 根本不存在有效地执行机制和对工人的补救措施。

sentences.english: It’s up to you to find out what happened and remedy the problem.
sentences.chinese: 那么，你该找找到底出了什么问题及补救办法。

sentences.english: John: I believe you should think some remedies.
sentences.chinese: 我相信你得想想补救方法。
皮肤脱水了，要怎么补救？

sentences.english: The unemployment recovery including drafts the funds to compensate with the guidance unemployment farmer regrets employed.
sentences.chinese: 失业补救包括征地款补偿和引导失业农民重新就业。

sentences.english: Very often, some form of reparation is needed.
sentences.chinese: 很多时候，某种形式上的补救措施是很有必要的。

sentences.english: Vital parts that are corroded or abraded should be repaired promptly.
sentences.chinese: 器材腐蚀或磨损严重部位要及时的补救。

sentences.english: Once you go blue-black, there's almost no going back.
sentences.chinese: 一旦不小心染成了蓝黑色，几乎就没有办法补救了。

sentences.english: But one distinctive difference between them is that Mingxing Styling Mousse contains Chinese herb which can help mend your damaged hair.
sentences.chinese: 不同的是它含有中草药成份对受损的头发有补救作用。

definition: lit. to mend the pen after sheep are lost (idiom)/fig. to act belatedly/better late than never/to lock the stable door after the horse has bolted
countermeasure for dealing with a situation
see 防患未然[fang2 huan4 wei4 ran2]
to correct/to amend/to put right/correction/CL:個|个[ge4]
the gains do not make up for the losses (idiom)
